Description: Moncton is changing its rules for fire pits, adding a 10 permit fee and closing a loophole that allowed fires even if the province imposed a fire ban because of dry conditions
Title: Moncton to close fire pit loophole, add 10 fee for permits
Author: Shane Magee

Description: A 22 year old man was sentenced to almost 14 months in jail Tuesday for brutally beating a Moncton bartender last year over being denied entry to a bar
Title: Man who brutally beat Moncton bartender sentenced to 14 months in jail
Author: Shane Magee

Description: Moncton has issued around 60 fines under a bylaw passed by city council last year that requires bundles of flyers to be left in mailboxes and on door steps instead of tossed on driveways and lawns
Title: Moncton has issued dozens of fines under flyer bylaw passed last year
Author: Shane Magee

Description: Intensive Day Treatment program offers people over the age of 19 in the Moncton area a four to six week program to deal with substance use or gambling issues
Title: Unique program offers day treatment for addiction issues in Moncton area
Author: Kate Letterick

Description: A Moncton woman says she and her family are relocating to Alberta to get away from self isolation rules the New Brunswick government had in place for rotational workers returning home
Title: Dropped isolation rule for rotational workers comes too late for N B family
Author: Aidan Cox
